pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, November 29, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, November 29, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:15 p.m.


2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks and will hold a media availability.

National Press Theatre
150 Wellington Street
Ottawa, Ontario

 Notes for media:

  • Journalists who are not members of the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery will require accreditation from the gallery in advance. For more information, contact Marc Fortier at Marc.fortier@parl.gc.ca
  • Following the announcement a media technical briefing will be held at 5:30 p.m. at the National Press Theatre. Participants can call in at local: 613-960-7526  or toll free: 877-413-4814 / Conference ID: 5982406


5:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Alberta, Rachel Notley.

Prime Ministerâ€™s Office
Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
